actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to require that motor vehicles in actual use be equipped with emission control systems at such time as the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Administration determines the effective systems are available.

summary.text: Requires, under the Clean Air Act, that motor vehicles in actual use be equipped with emission control systems at such time as the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Administration determines that effective systems are available. Provides for fines of $50 per diem for violations of this Act, $100 per diem for willful and knowing violations of this Act, and $1,000 per diem for violations of this Act involving commercial vehicles.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to require that motor vehicles in actual use be equipped with emission control systems at such time as the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Administration determines the effective systems are available.
